DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether preoperatively administer hydrocodone/acetaminophen ( HC/APAP ) reduce pain first trimester surgical abortion .
DOC.brief_title: Hydrocodone For Pain Control First Trimester Surgical Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan conduct double-blinded randomized placebo-controlled trial 120 woman undergo elective first trimester surgical abortion . These woman premedicated either two tab 5/350 hydrocodone/acetaminophen 2 tab placebo . All subject receive ibuprofen lorazepam preoperatively PCB . This study examine incremental benefit HC/APAP standard medication regimen . Randomization stratify two group . Subjects less 8 week gestation comprise early gestational age group . Subjects 8 week 0 day 10 week 6 day comprise late gestational age group . The investigator assess patient perception pain , nausea , satisfaction , anxiety multiple point clinic visit use 100-mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) .
